header_text: You are working on a project with a coworker at a small table in a coffee shop, and when your coffee arrives, you accidentally spill it all over their papers, which makes them jump in distress.

elements.text: After you clean up the mess as best as you can, you realize that their response was a normal, knee-jerk reaction. They say that they are not upset with you, and you believe that they are...

elements.name: You are working on a project with a coworker at a small table in a coffee shop, and when your coffee arrives, you accidentally spill it all over their papers, which makes them jump in distress._Social Situations_puzzle_word2
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
